function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of coronavirus through respiratory droplets and possibly via fecal-oral route.","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of the virus in both respiratory and gastrointestinal systems.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene measures, including handwashing and sanitization of surfaces. Also, proper management of sewage and wastewater.","Technologies":"Advanced sewage treatment systems, wastewater monitoring technology, and real-time PCR testing for viral genetic material in wastewater.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, waste management personnel.","Owner":"Government health agencies, public health organizations, waste management authorities."},{"Description":"Variability in duration and magnitude of viral shedding in patients infected with SARS-CoV-2.","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately determining the infectious period of patients, leading to challenges in isolation and containment.","Mitigation":"Regular testing and monitoring of patients for viral shedding, along with strict adherence to isolation protocols.","Technologies":"Real-time PCR testing for viral genetic material, rapid testing kits for viral shedding, and digital health monitoring systems.","People":"Healthcare workers, public health authorities, patients.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public health organizations, medical technology companies."},{"Description":"Detection of coronavirus genetic material in wastewater, indicating potential environmental contamination and public health risks.","Impact":"Possibility of environmental spread of the virus and increased risk of exposure to contaminated water sources.","Mitigation":"Enhanced wastewater treatment processes, routine monitoring of wastewater for viral genetic material, and public awareness campaigns on water safety.","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment systems, genetic material detection kits for wastewater monitoring, and real-time PCR testing for viral genetic material in water samples.","People":"General public, environmental health officers, water sanitation workers.","Owner":"Environmental protection agencies, water treatment facilities, public health organizations."}]}
